name: learning-git-2
description: You can use the [editor on GitHub](https://github.com/Swor71/learning-git-2/edit/master/README.md) to maintain and preview the content for your website in Markdown files.

scripts.test: npm run test:html && npm run test:js
scripts.init-project: npm run init:dirs && npm run init:files && npm run init:gitignore && npm run init:npm-install
scripts.init:dirs: bash -c "mkdir -p sass css vendor images js libs"
scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run build:autoprefixer && npm run test
scripts.build:cssdev: npm run build:sass-dev && npm run build:autoprefixer
scripts.watch: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run watch:sassprefixer" "npm run watch:browsersync"
